scripts.dev: npm run sass && npm run img && nodemon
scripts.build-patch: npm run sass && npm run img && auto-changelog && git commit -a -m "BUILD +patch" && git push && npm version patch
scripts.build-minor: npm run sass && npm run img && auto-changelog && git commit -a -m "BUILD +minor" && git push && npm version minor
scripts.build-major: npm run sass && npm run img && auto-changelog && git commit -a -m "BUILD +major" && git push && npm version major
